wikipedia_page.main:
Jason Smith (born 6 January 1964) is an English former professional snooker player.
On the first day of eligibility, his 18th birthday in 1982, Smith was winning league snooker for Mansfield.Smith reached the last 16 of the 1989 Grand Prix where he was defeated by  world champion Steve Davis. Through the tournament he defeated Tony Meo, Peter Francisco, Jon Wright and Joe O'Boye.
